title: Tidy Intelligence
text:
Economist by 🎓 and a data scientist by ❤️


  
    
    
  
    
     Mail
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  

  
  
As a graduate financial economist, I’ve acquired an extensive hypothesis–driven research and problem–solving expertise in data wrangling, statistical analysis, and model development.
As a data science professional, I have experience in underpinning business decisions with useful insights, developing novel data-driven products, and maintaining data-related best-practices from a technical perspective.
